scripts.ver: PKG_VER=$(jq -r .version ./package.json) && echo export const version = \'$PKG_VER\'\; > src/version.ts
scripts.ply-ver: PLY_VER=$(jq -r .version ./node_modules/@ply-ct/ply/package.json) && echo export const plyVersion = \'$PLY_VER\'\; >> src/version.ts
scripts.build: npm run ver && npm run ply-ver && tsc
scripts.create-exec: kubectl testkube create executor --image plyct/ply-testkube:1.0.2 --types ply-ct/test --name ply-executor
scripts.create-test: kubectl testkube create test --name ply-demo --type ply-ct/test --git-uri https://github.com/ply-ct/ply-demo.git
scripts.run-test: kubectl testkube run test ply-demo --args "values-files=test/values/global.json,test/values/ply-ct.json test-files=test/requests/movie-queries.ply.yaml,test/flows/get-movies.ply.flow events=true"
